cause.description:
AICR is a non-profit organization which focuses greater attention on research for cancer prevention and treatment, specifically in the area of diet, nutrition, and physical activity.
AICR has a team running in the Marine Corps Marathon on October 28, 2007. Each member of the team is responsible for raising funds to help this cause. Please visit my website to make a donation. www.aicr.org/elow
Thanks!
1. Research cancer prevention and treatment.
2. Find the links between diet, nutrition, and physical activity and cancer
3. Educate people on how to make changes for lowering their cancer risk.
cause.name: American Institute for Cancer Research-Team AICR
